Age 35 & older:							
Displacement	P1	P2	P3	Limits of Liability			
(CC's)	2015 & 2014 models	2013 & 2012 models	2011 & older models	30/60/15	50/100/25	100/300/50	250/500/100

1401 & Over	2146	1711	1396	149	272	294	345
